jobDescription: Want to revolutionize finance? Earnest is a financial technology company changing consumer lending. We are a team of math nerds, designers, computer geeks and innovators going after a huge market by creating a company built on flawless design, powerful software, advanced data science and an incredible client experience. We believe that if we fundamentally re-engineered the experience of borrowing money, it would look and feel completely different to how it does today.  We are looking for an experienced marketing manager with proven success, from concept to delivery, of sophisticated email and direct mail programs for a data-driven multi-product company.  This role will lead the development and execution of all email, both triggered and campaign-based, and direct mail efforts across the Earnest customer lifecycle. This includes all email programs for the Earnest Student Loan Refinancing, Personal Loan, and Home Loan products, defining the correct touchpoints and offers to both acquire clients in the short-term and retain them over the long-term.  As an Email Marketing Manager, you will report to the Head of Growth, and: Manage strategy and tactics of email marketing and direct mail, leveraging best practices as well as creative solutions to
